Text: NERC Board ActionsSubject NERC Board Actions XMimeOLE Produced By Microsoft Exchange V Date Tue Oct XMSHasAttach XMSTNEFCorrelator ThreadTopic NERC Board Actions ThreadIndex AcFWjyrpSZexsJdEdWZxtohdLEw XOriginalArrivalTime Oct UTC FILETIMEFCCCF To From Dave Nevius Sender Cc NERC Roster The NERC Board at its meeting today in Vancouver took bold steps to expand its role for developing standards for the wholesale electric industry in North America to ensure the independence of actions by its Security Coordinators from any wholesale or retail merchant functions and agreed to revamp the composition and voting structure of its standing committees Attached are the relevant resolutions and policy statements approved by the Board A press release concerning these actions is available on the NERC web site Dave Nevius Board Resolutions on Items doc FINAL SCRTF Initial Sectors and Criteria doc FINAL SCRTF Report to SHC and BOT doc Board Resolutions on Items doc FINAL SCRTF Initial Sectors and Criteria doc FINAL SCRTF Report to SHC and BOT doc
